item.title: Web scraping with Beautiful Soup: Plebiscito Colombia (October 2nd)
item.description:
Web scraping: Getting referendum data using Beautiful Soup In this post I am going to describe how to get the data of the peace referendum (which happened in October the 2nd in Colombia) from the official government website using Beautiful Soup in python (this a task was suggested by Sebastian Martinez). The data is not directly available but is represened as follows:
The aim is to get the percentages of votes for each town in Colombia by scraping the website.
